question:
[Thomas] sat with his daughter, [Laura], for ice cream at a local shop. [Thomas] 'son, [Phillip], aced his math class and made his father proud. [Laura] was playing with her brother [Matthew], but her mother [Kecia] told her she had to go to bed. [Phillip] loves his uncle, [Kent]. [Laura] enjoys playing cards with her brother. His name is [Matthew].
Question: How is [Kent] related to [Kecia]?
